text: Pitch Black is an extended play by Swedish extreme metal band Meshuggah. It was released on February 4 2013. The song "Pitch Black" was made in 2003 by Fredrik Thordendal. The other song on the EP, a live version of "Dancers to a Discordant System", is from the album obZen. == Track listing == == References == Category:2013 works Category:Meshuggah
title: Pitch Black (EP)
